title: About PlantGuardian
subtitle: We help farmers and gardeners diagnose leaf diseases in seconds and get clear, local-language advice on treatment and fertilizer.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: Make plant care simple. PlantGuardian combines a CNN classifier with a rule-based expert layer to turn a leaf photo into actionable treatment and fertilizer guidance.

how.title: How it works
steps: Open the scanner and upload or snap a leaf photo.
We detect the crop & disease from 44 supported classes.
You get care steps, medicine suggestions, and alternatives.
Optionally view fertilizer recommendations for your soil.

fast.title: Fast by design
fast.body: GPU-friendly CNN + small payloads keep results snappy.

actionable.title: Actionable tips
actionable.body: Clear care steps, specific treatments, and safer alternatives.

local.title: Local context
local.body: Advice aligned with regional conditions where possible.

multilang.title: English & Bangla
multilang.body: Full i18n via i18next; easy to add more locales later.
